item.value: Photos by Liz Martin / SourceMedia Group News

slide.caption: Storyteller David Novak on Wednesday, April 13, 2011, at Westfield Elementary School in Robins. Novak will be visiting Linn-Mar schools the rest of the week. (Liz Martin/SourceMedia Group News)
